abstract.text: To integrate the Ad Mediation SDK into your project, follow the step-by-step guide provided in the documentation. Ensure that you have accounts set up with the ad networks you wish to mediate and configure them within the SDK dashboard.
Mintegral adapter for CloudX Core iOS SDK

Rewarded ads are interactive advertisements that offer users the choice to engage with them in return for in-app incentives. This guide will demonstrate how to integrate rewarded ads from the CloiudX SDK into an iOS application.

A native ad is a type of paid promotion that seamlessly integrates into its surrounding content, mirroring the look and feel of the platform it appears on. Designed to blend in rather than disrupt, native ads aim to deliver a more organic and engaging advertising experience for users.
Meta adapter for CloudX Core iOS SDK

Banner advertisements in the CloudX SDK are designed to seamlessly integrate within an app’s interface, typically positioned at the top or bottom of the device’s display. These ads remain visible as users engage with the app and can refresh automatically after a certain period of time.
Google Ad Manager adapter for CloudX Core iOS SDK

Interstitial ads are immersive, full-screen advertisements that temporarily cover the app’s interface and remain visible until the user dismisses them. These ads are commonly displayed at logical transition points within an app’s flow, like between different activities or during pauses between game levels. When an interstitial ad is presented, users have the option to interact with the ad, leading them to its content, or they can close the ad and resume their activity within the app.
Demo adapter for CloudX Core iOS SDK
